title: WB Table Web Component
description: Schema for wb-table custom element attributes

data-json.description: JSON string containing table data as array of objects or arrays

data-source.description: Global variable name to watch for automatic data updates

compact.description: Use compact spacing for smaller tables

page-size.description: Number of rows per page when pagination is enabled

auto-headers.description: Automatically generate headers from JSON object keys

header-transform.description: How to transform header text display

empty-message.description: Message to show when table has no data

loading-message.description: Message to show while data is loading

error-message.description: Message to show when data loading fails

max-rows.description: Maximum number of rows to display

ondata-changed.description: JavaScript code to execute when table data changes

onrow-added.description: JavaScript code to execute when a row is added

onrow-removed.description: JavaScript code to execute when a row is removed

oncleared.description: JavaScript code to execute when table is cleared

onsorted.description: JavaScript code to execute when table is sorted

onfiltered.description: JavaScript code to execute when table is filtered

onwb-table:data-changed.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-table:data-changed event

onwb-table:row-added.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-table:row-added event

onwb-table:row-removed.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-table:row-removed event

onwb-table:cleared.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-table:cleared event

onwb-table:sorted.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-table:sorted event

onwb-table:filtered.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-table:filtered event

aria-labelledby.description: ID of element that labels this table

aria-describedby.description: ID of element that describes this table

aria-rowcount.description: Total number of rows in the data set

aria-colcount.description: Total number of columns in the table
